alert.note: Alert for Navajo (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 13 at 2:28PM MST until September 13 at 3:15PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Navajo County in north central Arizona... * Until 315 PM MST. * At 228 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was approaching Aripine, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Aripine and Heber-Overgaard. This includes the following highways... State Route 277 between mile markers 312 and 319. State Route 260 between mile markers 313 and 321. State Route 377 between mile markers 0 and 1. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
